message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can do a bit better than that. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit, so I can offer it to you for $105.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $95?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make a profit. I can do $98, and that's as low as I can go.
I'm really close to walking away, but I still think this product would be a great fit. Would you be willing to meet me at $97?
I think we're getting close, Bob! I can see you're really interested in the product. I'm willing to meet you at $97, but I need to make a bit more than that. I can offer it to you for $99.
